seo: 致远OA,任意文件读取,CNVD-2020-62422,漏洞检测
summary: 检测致远OA系统是否存在任意文件读取漏洞（CNVD-2020-62422），通过构造特定请求判断是否可以成功读取敏感文件。
summary_en: Detect whether the ZY OA system has an arbitrary file read vulnerability (CNVD-2020-62422) by constructing specific requests to determine if sensitive files can be successfully read.
